    • Method Detail

      • doIdsMatch

        public static boolean doIdsMatch(NacAlarm alarm,
                                 android.content.Intent intent)
        Check the saved NFC tag ID in the alarm against the one in the intent. Return True if the alarm does not have a saved ID, or if the IDs match, and False otherwise.

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(android.content.Context context)
        Check if NFC exists on this device.

      • getTag

        public static android.nfc.Tag getTag(android.content.Intent intent)
        Returns:
        An NFC tag from the given Intent.

      • isEnabled

        public static boolean isEnabled(android.content.Context context)
        Returns:
        True if the NFC adapter is enabled, and False otherwise.

      • parseId

        public static java.lang.String parseId(android.nfc.Tag nfcTag)
        Parse NFC tag ID to a readable format.

      • prompt

        public static void prompt(android.content.Context context)
        Prompt the user to enable NFC.

      • shouldUseNfc

        public static boolean shouldUseNfc(android.content.Context context,
                                   NacAlarm alarm)
        Returns:
        True if should use NFC, and False otherwise.

      • start

        public static void start(android.app.Activity activity)
        See Also:
        start(Activity, Intent)

      • start

        public static void start(android.app.Activity activity,
                         android.content.Intent intent)
        Enable NFC dispatch, so that the app can discover NFC tags.

      • stop

        public static void stop(android.content.Context context)
        Stop NFC dispatch, so the app does not waste battery when it does not need to discover NFC tags.

      • wasScanned

        public static boolean wasScanned(android.content.Intent intent)
        Returns:
        True if an NFC tag was scanned/discovered and False otherwise.
